Entries.Blacksmith.1: There's a tape inside 'The Essential Blues Collection, vol. 2'
Entries.Blacksmith.4: Dear Emily,^^I know you only see me as a friend, but I wish...^... It's my fault. I'm too shy. I'll never have the courage to tell you the truth...^That's why I'm writing this letter to myself that I'll certainly crumple up and toss in the corner...
Entries.Blacksmith.9: A to-do list and a resource inventory. There is a lack of stone.
Entries.Blacksmith.11: A box filled with coal, ready for crafting or smelting.
Entries.Blacksmith.12: A box filled with coal, ready for crafting or smelting.
